Text: I'm going to rely on my skills in english. Are there any occasional dialogue in for example spanish with no subtitles besides the dutch one?

So, in my best Engrish; I found no subs anywhere, skipping through the movie...
But mostly happy with the two lions, though ;-)
Vriendelijke groetjes
